String.string: Go to {@LinkCreature:59#1013#Zinji} and ride a pegasus to Velika. Speak with Dougal in Velika Headquarters.
Bring the report to Garrison Commander Samael at Velika Headquarters.
Bring the report to Garrison Commander Samael at Velika Headquarters.
Receive reward from Samael at Velik's Steps.
Receive reward from Samael at Velik's Steps.
